00040         // Config
00041 
00042         /* GJK  */ 
00043 #define GJK_MAX_ITERATIONS      128
00044 
00045 #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00046         #define GJK_ACCURACY            ((btScalar)1e-12)
00047         #define GJK_MIN_DISTANCE        ((btScalar)1e-12)
00048         #define GJK_DUPLICATED_EPS      ((btScalar)1e-12)
00049 #else
00050         #define GJK_ACCURACY            ((btScalar)0.0001)
00051         #define GJK_MIN_DISTANCE        ((btScalar)0.0001)
00052         #define GJK_DUPLICATED_EPS      ((btScalar)0.0001)
00053 #endif //BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00054 
00055 
00056 #define GJK_SIMPLEX2_EPS        ((btScalar)0.0)
00057 #define GJK_SIMPLEX3_EPS        ((btScalar)0.0)
00058 #define GJK_SIMPLEX4_EPS        ((btScalar)0.0)
00059 
00060         /* EPA  */ 
00061 #define EPA_MAX_VERTICES        128
00062 #define EPA_MAX_ITERATIONS      255
00063 
00064 #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00065         #define EPA_ACCURACY            ((btScalar)1e-12)
00066         #define EPA_PLANE_EPS           ((btScalar)1e-14)
00067         #define EPA_INSIDE_EPS          ((btScalar)1e-9)
00068 #else
00069         #define EPA_ACCURACY            ((btScalar)0.0001)
00070         #define EPA_PLANE_EPS           ((btScalar)0.00001)
00071         #define EPA_INSIDE_EPS          ((btScalar)0.01)
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #define EPA_FALLBACK            (10*EPA_ACCURACY)
00075 #define EPA_MAX_FACES           (EPA_MAX_VERTICES*2)

00078         // Shorthands
00079         typedef unsigned int    U;
00080         typedef unsigned char   U1;

00082         // MinkowskiDiff
00083         struct  MinkowskiDiff
00084         {
00085                 const btConvexShape*    m_shapes[2];
00086                 btMatrix3x3                             m_toshape1;
00087                 btTransform                             m_toshape0;
00088 #ifdef __SPU__
00089                 bool                                    m_enableMargin;
00090 #else
00091                 btVector3                               (btConvexShape::*Ls)(const btVector3&) const;
00092 #endif//__SPU__
00093                 
00094 
00095                 MinkowskiDiff()
00096                 {
00097 
00098                 }
00099 #ifdef __SPU__
00100                         void                                    EnableMargin(bool enable)
00101                 {
00102                         m_enableMargin = enable;
00103                 }       
00104                 inline btVector3                Support0(const btVector3& d) const
00105                 {
00106                         if (m_enableMargin)
00107                         {
00108                                 return m_shapes[0]->localGetSupportVertexNonVirtual(d);
00109                         } else
00110                         {
00111                                 return m_shapes[0]->localGetSupportVertexWithoutMarginNonVirtual(d);
00112                         }
00113                 }
00114                 inline btVector3                Support1(const btVector3& d) const
00115                 {
00116                         if (m_enableMargin)
00117                         {
00118                                 return m_toshape0*(m_shapes[1]->localGetSupportVertexNonVirtual(m_toshape1*d));
00119                         } else
00120                         {
00121                                 return m_toshape0*(m_shapes[1]->localGetSupportVertexWithoutMarginNonVirtual(m_toshape1*d));
00122                         }
00123                 }
00124 #else
00125                 void                                    EnableMargin(bool enable)
00126                 {
00127                         if(enable)
00128                                 Ls=&btConvexShape::localGetSupportVertexNonVirtual;
00129                         else
00130                                 Ls=&btConvexShape::localGetSupportVertexWithoutMarginNonVirtual;
00131                 }       
00132                 inline btVector3                Support0(const btVector3& d) const
00133                 {
00134                         return(((m_shapes[0])->*(Ls))(d));
00135                 }
00136                 inline btVector3                Support1(const btVector3& d) const
00137                 {
00138                         return(m_toshape0*((m_shapes[1])->*(Ls))(m_toshape1*d));
00139                 }
00140 #endif //__SPU__
00141 
00142                 inline btVector3                Support(const btVector3& d) const
00143                 {
00144                         return(Support0(d)-Support1(-d));
00145                 }
00146                 btVector3                               Support(const btVector3& d,U index) const
00147                 {
00148                         if(index)
00149                                 return(Support1(d));
00150                         else
00151                                 return(Support0(d));
00152                 }
00153         };
00154 
00155         typedef MinkowskiDiff   tShape;

00158         // GJK
00159         struct  GJK
00160         {
00161                 /* Types                */ 
00162                 struct  sSV
00163                 {
00164                         btVector3       d,w;
00165                 };
00166                 struct  sSimplex
00167                 {
00168                         sSV*            c[4];
00169                         btScalar        p[4];
00170                         U                       rank;
00171                 };
00172                 struct  eStatus { enum _ {
00173                         Valid,
00174                         Inside,
00175                         Failed          };};
00176                         /* Fields               */ 
00177                         tShape                  m_shape;
00178                         btVector3               m_ray;
00179                         btScalar                m_distance;
00180                         sSimplex                m_simplices[2];
00181                         sSV                             m_store[4];
00182                         sSV*                    m_free[4];
00183                         U                               m_nfree;
00184                         U                               m_current;
00185                         sSimplex*               m_simplex;
00186                         eStatus::_              m_status;
00187                         /* Methods              */ 
00188                         GJK()
00189                         {
00190                                 Initialize();
00191                         }
00192                         void                            Initialize()
00193                         {
00194                                 m_ray           =       btVector3(0,0,0);
00195                                 m_nfree         =       0;
00196                                 m_status        =       eStatus::Failed;
00197                                 m_current       =       0;
00198                                 m_distance      =       0;
00199                         }
00200                         eStatus::_                      Evaluate(const tShape& shapearg,const btVector3& guess)
00201                         {
00202                                 U                       iterations=0;
00203                                 btScalar        sqdist=0;
00204                                 btScalar        alpha=0;
00205                                 btVector3       lastw[4];
00206                                 U                       clastw=0;
00207                                 /* Initialize solver            */ 
00208                                 m_free[0]                       =       &m_store[0];
00209                                 m_free[1]                       =       &m_store[1];
00210                                 m_free[2]                       =       &m_store[2];
00211                                 m_free[3]                       =       &m_store[3];
00212                                 m_nfree                         =       4;
00213                                 m_current                       =       0;
00214                                 m_status                        =       eStatus::Valid;
00215                                 m_shape                         =       shapearg;
00216                                 m_distance                      =       0;
00217                                 /* Initialize simplex           */ 
00218                                 m_simplices[0].rank     =       0;
00219                                 m_ray                           =       guess;
00220                                 const btScalar  sqrl=   m_ray.length2();
00221                                 appendvertice(m_simplices[0],sqrl>0?-m_ray:btVector3(1,0,0));
00222                                 m_simplices[0].p[0]     =       1;
00223                                 m_ray                           =       m_simplices[0].c[0]->w; 
00224                                 sqdist                          =       sqrl;
00225                                 lastw[0]                        =
00226                                         lastw[1]                        =
00227                                         lastw[2]                        =
00228                                         lastw[3]                        =       m_ray;
00229                                 /* Loop                                         */ 
00230                                 do      {
00231                                         const U         next=1-m_current;
00232                                         sSimplex&       cs=m_simplices[m_current];
00233                                         sSimplex&       ns=m_simplices[next];
00234                                         /* Check zero                                                   */ 
00235                                         const btScalar  rl=m_ray.length();
00236                                         if(rl<GJK_MIN_DISTANCE)
00237                                         {/* Touching or inside                          */ 
00238                                                 m_status=eStatus::Inside;
00239                                                 break;
00240                                         }
00241                                         /* Append new vertice in -'v' direction */ 
00242                                         appendvertice(cs,-m_ray);
00243                                         const btVector3&        w=cs.c[cs.rank-1]->w;
00244                                         bool                            found=false;
00245                                         for(U i=0;i<4;++i)
00246                                         {
00247                                                 if((w-lastw[i]).length2()<GJK_DUPLICATED_EPS)
00248                                                 { found=true;break; }
00249                                         }
00250                                         if(found)
00251                                         {/* Return old simplex                          */ 
00252                                                 removevertice(m_simplices[m_current]);
00253                                                 break;
00254                                         }
00255                                         else
00256                                         {/* Update lastw                                        */ 
00257                                                 lastw[clastw=(clastw+1)&3]=w;
00258                                         }
00259                                         /* Check for termination                                */ 
00260                                         const btScalar  omega=btDot(m_ray,w)/rl;
00261                                         alpha=btMax(omega,alpha);
00262                                         if(((rl-alpha)-(GJK_ACCURACY*rl))<=0)
00263                                         {/* Return old simplex                          */ 
00264                                                 removevertice(m_simplices[m_current]);
00265                                                 break;
00266                                         }               
00267                                         /* Reduce simplex                                               */ 
00268                                         btScalar        weights[4];
00269                                         U                       mask=0;
00270                                         switch(cs.rank)
00271                                         {
00272                                         case    2:      sqdist=projectorigin(   cs.c[0]->w,
00273                                                                         cs.c[1]->w,
00274                                                                         weights,mask);break;
00275                                         case    3:      sqdist=projectorigin(   cs.c[0]->w,
00276                                                                         cs.c[1]->w,
00277                                                                         cs.c[2]->w,
00278                                                                         weights,mask);break;
00279                                         case    4:      sqdist=projectorigin(   cs.c[0]->w,
00280                                                                         cs.c[1]->w,
00281                                                                         cs.c[2]->w,
00282                                                                         cs.c[3]->w,
00283                                                                         weights,mask);break;
00284                                         }
00285                                         if(sqdist>=0)
00286                                         {/* Valid       */ 
00287                                                 ns.rank         =       0;
00288                                                 m_ray           =       btVector3(0,0,0);
00289                                                 m_current       =       next;
00290                                                 for(U i=0,ni=cs.rank;i<ni;++i)
00291                                                 {
00292                                                         if(mask&(1<<i))
00293                                                         {
00294                                                                 ns.c[ns.rank]           =       cs.c[i];
00295                                                                 ns.p[ns.rank++]         =       weights[i];
00296                                                                 m_ray                           +=      cs.c[i]->w*weights[i];
00297                                                         }
00298                                                         else
00299                                                         {
00300                                                                 m_free[m_nfree++]       =       cs.c[i];
00301                                                         }
00302                                                 }
00303                                                 if(mask==15) m_status=eStatus::Inside;
00304                                         }
00305                                         else
00306                                         {/* Return old simplex                          */ 
00307                                                 removevertice(m_simplices[m_current]);
00308                                                 break;
00309                                         }
00310                                         m_status=((++iterations)<GJK_MAX_ITERATIONS)?m_status:eStatus::Failed;
00311                                 } while(m_status==eStatus::Valid);
00312                                 m_simplex=&m_simplices[m_current];
00313                                 switch(m_status)
00314                                 {
00315                                 case    eStatus::Valid:         m_distance=m_ray.length();break;
00316                                 case    eStatus::Inside:        m_distance=0;break;
00317                                 default:
00318                                         {
00319                                         }
00320                                 }       
00321                                 return(m_status);
00322                         }
00323                         bool                                    EncloseOrigin()
00324                         {
00325                                 switch(m_simplex->rank)
00326                                 {
00327                                 case    1:
00328                                         {
00329                                                 for(U i=0;i<3;++i)
00330                                                 {
00331                                                         btVector3               axis=btVector3(0,0,0);
00332                                                         axis[i]=1;
00333                                                         appendvertice(*m_simplex, axis);
00334                                                         if(EncloseOrigin())     return(true);
00335                                                         removevertice(*m_simplex);
00336                                                         appendvertice(*m_simplex,-axis);
00337                                                         if(EncloseOrigin())     return(true);
00338                                                         removevertice(*m_simplex);
00339                                                 }
00340                                         }
00341                                         break;
00342                                 case    2:
00343                                         {
00344                                                 const btVector3 d=m_simplex->c[1]->w-m_simplex->c[0]->w;
00345                                                 for(U i=0;i<3;++i)
00346                                                 {
00347                                                         btVector3               axis=btVector3(0,0,0);
00348                                                         axis[i]=1;
00349                                                         const btVector3 p=btCross(d,axis);
00350                                                         if(p.length2()>0)
00351                                                         {
00352                                                                 appendvertice(*m_simplex, p);
00353                                                                 if(EncloseOrigin())     return(true);
00354                                                                 removevertice(*m_simplex);
00355                                                                 appendvertice(*m_simplex,-p);
00356                                                                 if(EncloseOrigin())     return(true);
00357                                                                 removevertice(*m_simplex);
00358                                                         }
00359                                                 }
00360                                         }
00361                                         break;
00362                                 case    3:
00363                                         {
00364                                                 const btVector3 n=btCross(m_simplex->c[1]->w-m_simplex->c[0]->w,
00365                                                         m_simplex->c[2]->w-m_simplex->c[0]->w);
00366                                                 if(n.length2()>0)
00367                                                 {
00368                                                         appendvertice(*m_simplex,n);
00369                                                         if(EncloseOrigin())     return(true);
00370                                                         removevertice(*m_simplex);
00371                                                         appendvertice(*m_simplex,-n);
00372                                                         if(EncloseOrigin())     return(true);
00373                                                         removevertice(*m_simplex);
00374                                                 }
00375                                         }
00376                                         break;
00377                                 case    4:
00378                                         {
00379                                                 if(btFabs(det(  m_simplex->c[0]->w-m_simplex->c[3]->w,
00380                                                         m_simplex->c[1]->w-m_simplex->c[3]->w,
00381                                                         m_simplex->c[2]->w-m_simplex->c[3]->w))>0)
00382                                                         return(true);
00383                                         }
00384                                         break;
00385                                 }
00386                                 return(false);
00387                         }
00388                         /* Internals    */ 
00389                         void                            getsupport(const btVector3& d,sSV& sv) const
00390                         {
00391                                 sv.d    =       d/d.length();
00392                                 sv.w    =       m_shape.Support(sv.d);
00393                         }
00394                         void                            removevertice(sSimplex& simplex)
00395                         {
00396                                 m_free[m_nfree++]=simplex.c[--simplex.rank];
00397                         }
00398                         void                            appendvertice(sSimplex& simplex,const btVector3& v)
00399                         {
00400                                 simplex.p[simplex.rank]=0;
00401                                 simplex.c[simplex.rank]=m_free[--m_nfree];
00402                                 getsupport(v,*simplex.c[simplex.rank++]);
00403                         }
00404                         static btScalar         det(const btVector3& a,const btVector3& b,const btVector3& c)
00405                         {
00406                                 return( a.y()*b.z()*c.x()+a.z()*b.x()*c.y()-
00407                                         a.x()*b.z()*c.y()-a.y()*b.x()*c.z()+
00408                                         a.x()*b.y()*c.z()-a.z()*b.y()*c.x());
00409                         }
00410                         static btScalar         projectorigin(  const btVector3& a,
00411                                 const btVector3& b,
00412                                 btScalar* w,U& m)
00413                         {
00414                                 const btVector3 d=b-a;
00415                                 const btScalar  l=d.length2();
00416                                 if(l>GJK_SIMPLEX2_EPS)
00417                                 {
00418                                         const btScalar  t(l>0?-btDot(a,d)/l:0);
00419                                         if(t>=1)                { w[0]=0;w[1]=1;m=2;return(b.length2()); }
00420                                         else if(t<=0)   { w[0]=1;w[1]=0;m=1;return(a.length2()); }
00421                                         else                    { w[0]=1-(w[1]=t);m=3;return((a+d*t).length2()); }
00422                                 }
00423                                 return(-1);
00424                         }
00425                         static btScalar         projectorigin(  const btVector3& a,
00426                                 const btVector3& b,
00427                                 const btVector3& c,
00428                                 btScalar* w,U& m)
00429                         {
00430                                 static const U          imd3[]={1,2,0};
00431                                 const btVector3*        vt[]={&a,&b,&c};
00432                                 const btVector3         dl[]={a-b,b-c,c-a};
00433                                 const btVector3         n=btCross(dl[0],dl[1]);
00434                                 const btScalar          l=n.length2();
00435                                 if(l>GJK_SIMPLEX3_EPS)
00436                                 {
00437                                         btScalar        mindist=-1;
00438                                         btScalar        subw[2]={0.f,0.f};
00439                                         U                       subm(0);
00440                                         for(U i=0;i<3;++i)
00441                                         {
00442                                                 if(btDot(*vt[i],btCross(dl[i],n))>0)
00443                                                 {
00444                                                         const U                 j=imd3[i];
00445                                                         const btScalar  subd(projectorigin(*vt[i],*vt[j],subw,subm));
00446                                                         if((mindist<0)||(subd<mindist))
00447                                                         {
00448                                                                 mindist         =       subd;
00449                                                                 m                       =       static_cast<U>(((subm&1)?1<<i:0)+((subm&2)?1<<j:0));
00450                                                                 w[i]            =       subw[0];
00451                                                                 w[j]            =       subw[1];
00452                                                                 w[imd3[j]]      =       0;                              
00453                                                         }
00454                                                 }
00455                                         }
00456                                         if(mindist<0)
00457                                         {
00458                                                 const btScalar  d=btDot(a,n);   
00459                                                 const btScalar  s=btSqrt(l);
00460                                                 const btVector3 p=n*(d/l);
00461                                                 mindist =       p.length2();
00462                                                 m               =       7;
00463                                                 w[0]    =       (btCross(dl[1],b-p)).length()/s;
00464                                                 w[1]    =       (btCross(dl[2],c-p)).length()/s;
00465                                                 w[2]    =       1-(w[0]+w[1]);
00466                                         }
00467                                         return(mindist);
00468                                 }
00469                                 return(-1);
00470                         }
00471                         static btScalar         projectorigin(  const btVector3& a,
00472                                 const btVector3& b,
00473                                 const btVector3& c,
00474                                 const btVector3& d,
00475                                 btScalar* w,U& m)
00476                         {
00477                                 static const U          imd3[]={1,2,0};
00478                                 const btVector3*        vt[]={&a,&b,&c,&d};
00479                                 const btVector3         dl[]={a-d,b-d,c-d};
00480                                 const btScalar          vl=det(dl[0],dl[1],dl[2]);
00481                                 const bool                      ng=(vl*btDot(a,btCross(b-c,a-b)))<=0;
00482                                 if(ng&&(btFabs(vl)>GJK_SIMPLEX4_EPS))
00483                                 {
00484                                         btScalar        mindist=-1;
00485                                         btScalar        subw[3]={0.f,0.f,0.f};
00486                                         U                       subm(0);
00487                                         for(U i=0;i<3;++i)
00488                                         {
00489                                                 const U                 j=imd3[i];
00490                                                 const btScalar  s=vl*btDot(d,btCross(dl[i],dl[j]));
00491                                                 if(s>0)
00492                                                 {
00493                                                         const btScalar  subd=projectorigin(*vt[i],*vt[j],d,subw,subm);
00494                                                         if((mindist<0)||(subd<mindist))
00495                                                         {
00496                                                                 mindist         =       subd;
00497                                                                 m                       =       static_cast<U>((subm&1?1<<i:0)+
00498                                                                         (subm&2?1<<j:0)+
00499                                                                         (subm&4?8:0));
00500                                                                 w[i]            =       subw[0];
00501                                                                 w[j]            =       subw[1];
00502                                                                 w[imd3[j]]      =       0;
00503                                                                 w[3]            =       subw[2];
00504                                                         }
00505                                                 }
00506                                         }
00507                                         if(mindist<0)
00508                                         {
00509                                                 mindist =       0;
00510                                                 m               =       15;
00511                                                 w[0]    =       det(c,b,d)/vl;
00512                                                 w[1]    =       det(a,c,d)/vl;
00513                                                 w[2]    =       det(b,a,d)/vl;
00514                                                 w[3]    =       1-(w[0]+w[1]+w[2]);
00515                                         }
00516                                         return(mindist);
00517                                 }
00518                                 return(-1);
00519                         }
00520         };
00521 
00522         // EPA
00523         struct  EPA
00524         {
00525                 /* Types                */ 
00526                 typedef GJK::sSV        sSV;
00527                 struct  sFace
00528                 {
00529                         btVector3       n;
00530                         btScalar        d;
00531                         sSV*            c[3];
00532                         sFace*          f[3];
00533                         sFace*          l[2];
00534                         U1                      e[3];
00535                         U1                      pass;
00536                 };
00537                 struct  sList
00538                 {
00539                         sFace*          root;
00540                         U                       count;
00541                         sList() : root(0),count(0)      {}
00542                 };
00543                 struct  sHorizon
00544                 {
00545                         sFace*          cf;
00546                         sFace*          ff;
00547                         U                       nf;
00548                         sHorizon() : cf(0),ff(0),nf(0)  {}
00549                 };
00550                 struct  eStatus { enum _ {
00551                         Valid,
00552                         Touching,
00553                         Degenerated,
00554                         NonConvex,
00555                         InvalidHull,            
00556                         OutOfFaces,
00557                         OutOfVertices,
00558                         AccuraryReached,
00559                         FallBack,
00560                         Failed          };};
00561                         /* Fields               */ 
00562                         eStatus::_              m_status;
00563                         GJK::sSimplex   m_result;
00564                         btVector3               m_normal;
00565                         btScalar                m_depth;
00566                         sSV                             m_sv_store[EPA_MAX_VERTICES];
00567                         sFace                   m_fc_store[EPA_MAX_FACES];
00568                         U                               m_nextsv;
00569                         sList                   m_hull;
00570                         sList                   m_stock;
00571                         /* Methods              */ 
00572                         EPA()
00573                         {
00574                                 Initialize();   
00575                         }
00576 
00577 
00578                         static inline void              bind(sFace* fa,U ea,sFace* fb,U eb)
00579                         {
00580                                 fa->e[ea]=(U1)eb;fa->f[ea]=fb;
00581                                 fb->e[eb]=(U1)ea;fb->f[eb]=fa;
00582                         }
00583                         static inline void              append(sList& list,sFace* face)
00584                         {
00585                                 face->l[0]      =       0;
00586                                 face->l[1]      =       list.root;
00587                                 if(list.root) list.root->l[0]=face;
00588                                 list.root       =       face;
00589                                 ++list.count;
00590                         }
00591                         static inline void              remove(sList& list,sFace* face)
00592                         {
00593                                 if(face->l[1]) face->l[1]->l[0]=face->l[0];
00594                                 if(face->l[0]) face->l[0]->l[1]=face->l[1];
00595                                 if(face==list.root) list.root=face->l[1];
00596                                 --list.count;
00597                         }
00598 
00599 
00600                         void                            Initialize()
00601                         {
00602                                 m_status        =       eStatus::Failed;
00603                                 m_normal        =       btVector3(0,0,0);
00604                                 m_depth         =       0;
00605                                 m_nextsv        =       0;
00606                                 for(U i=0;i<EPA_MAX_FACES;++i)
00607                                 {
00608                                         append(m_stock,&m_fc_store[EPA_MAX_FACES-i-1]);
00609                                 }
00610                         }
00611                         eStatus::_                      Evaluate(GJK& gjk,const btVector3& guess)
00612                         {
00613                                 GJK::sSimplex&  simplex=*gjk.m_simplex;
00614                                 if((simplex.rank>1)&&gjk.EncloseOrigin())
00615                                 {
00616 
00617                                         /* Clean up                             */ 
00618                                         while(m_hull.root)
00619                                         {
00620                                                 sFace*  f = m_hull.root;
00621                                                 remove(m_hull,f);
00622                                                 append(m_stock,f);
00623                                         }
00624                                         m_status        =       eStatus::Valid;
00625                                         m_nextsv        =       0;
00626                                         /* Orient simplex               */ 
00627                                         if(gjk.det(     simplex.c[0]->w-simplex.c[3]->w,
00628                                                 simplex.c[1]->w-simplex.c[3]->w,
00629                                                 simplex.c[2]->w-simplex.c[3]->w)<0)
00630                                         {
00631                                                 btSwap(simplex.c[0],simplex.c[1]);
00632                                                 btSwap(simplex.p[0],simplex.p[1]);
00633                                         }
00634                                         /* Build initial hull   */ 
00635                                         sFace*  tetra[]={newface(simplex.c[0],simplex.c[1],simplex.c[2],true),
00636                                                 newface(simplex.c[1],simplex.c[0],simplex.c[3],true),
00637                                                 newface(simplex.c[2],simplex.c[1],simplex.c[3],true),
00638                                                 newface(simplex.c[0],simplex.c[2],simplex.c[3],true)};
00639                                         if(m_hull.count==4)
00640                                         {
00641                                                 sFace*          best=findbest();
00642                                                 sFace           outer=*best;
00643                                                 U                       pass=0;
00644                                                 U                       iterations=0;
00645                                                 bind(tetra[0],0,tetra[1],0);
00646                                                 bind(tetra[0],1,tetra[2],0);
00647                                                 bind(tetra[0],2,tetra[3],0);
00648                                                 bind(tetra[1],1,tetra[3],2);
00649                                                 bind(tetra[1],2,tetra[2],1);
00650                                                 bind(tetra[2],2,tetra[3],1);
00651                                                 m_status=eStatus::Valid;
00652                                                 for(;iterations<EPA_MAX_ITERATIONS;++iterations)
00653                                                 {
00654                                                         if(m_nextsv<EPA_MAX_VERTICES)
00655                                                         {       
00656                                                                 sHorizon                horizon;
00657                                                                 sSV*                    w=&m_sv_store[m_nextsv++];
00658                                                                 bool                    valid=true;                                     
00659                                                                 best->pass      =       (U1)(++pass);
00660                                                                 gjk.getsupport(best->n,*w);
00661                                                                 const btScalar  wdist=btDot(best->n,w->w)-best->d;
00662                                                                 if(wdist>EPA_ACCURACY)
00663                                                                 {
00664                                                                         for(U j=0;(j<3)&&valid;++j)
00665                                                                         {
00666                                                                                 valid&=expand(  pass,w,
00667                                                                                         best->f[j],best->e[j],
00668                                                                                         horizon);
00669                                                                         }
00670                                                                         if(valid&&(horizon.nf>=3))
00671                                                                         {
00672                                                                                 bind(horizon.cf,1,horizon.ff,2);
00673                                                                                 remove(m_hull,best);
00674                                                                                 append(m_stock,best);
00675                                                                                 best=findbest();
00676                                                                                 outer=*best;
00677                                                                         } else { m_status=eStatus::InvalidHull;break; }
00678                                                                 } else { m_status=eStatus::AccuraryReached;break; }
00679                                                         } else { m_status=eStatus::OutOfVertices;break; }
00680                                                 }
00681                                                 const btVector3 projection=outer.n*outer.d;
00682                                                 m_normal        =       outer.n;
00683                                                 m_depth         =       outer.d;
00684                                                 m_result.rank   =       3;
00685                                                 m_result.c[0]   =       outer.c[0];
00686                                                 m_result.c[1]   =       outer.c[1];
00687                                                 m_result.c[2]   =       outer.c[2];
00688                                                 m_result.p[0]   =       btCross(        outer.c[1]->w-projection,
00689                                                         outer.c[2]->w-projection).length();
00690                                                 m_result.p[1]   =       btCross(        outer.c[2]->w-projection,
00691                                                         outer.c[0]->w-projection).length();
00692                                                 m_result.p[2]   =       btCross(        outer.c[0]->w-projection,
00693                                                         outer.c[1]->w-projection).length();
00694                                                 const btScalar  sum=m_result.p[0]+m_result.p[1]+m_result.p[2];
00695                                                 m_result.p[0]   /=      sum;
00696                                                 m_result.p[1]   /=      sum;
00697                                                 m_result.p[2]   /=      sum;
00698                                                 return(m_status);
00699                                         }
00700                                 }
00701                                 /* Fallback             */ 
00702                                 m_status        =       eStatus::FallBack;
00703                                 m_normal        =       -guess;
00704                                 const btScalar  nl=m_normal.length();
00705                                 if(nl>0)
00706                                         m_normal        =       m_normal/nl;
00707                                 else
00708                                         m_normal        =       btVector3(1,0,0);
00709                                 m_depth =       0;
00710                                 m_result.rank=1;
00711                                 m_result.c[0]=simplex.c[0];
00712                                 m_result.p[0]=1;        
00713                                 return(m_status);
00714                         }
00715                         bool getedgedist(sFace* face, sSV* a, sSV* b, btScalar& dist)
00716                         {
00717                                 const btVector3 ba = b->w - a->w;
00718                                 const btVector3 n_ab = btCross(ba, face->n); // Outward facing edge normal direction, on triangle plane
00719                                 const btScalar a_dot_nab = btDot(a->w, n_ab); // Only care about the sign to determine inside/outside, so not normalization required
00720 
00721                                 if(a_dot_nab < 0)
00722                                 {
00723                                         // Outside of edge a->b
00724 
00725                                         const btScalar ba_l2 = ba.length2();
00726                                         const btScalar a_dot_ba = btDot(a->w, ba);
00727                                         const btScalar b_dot_ba = btDot(b->w, ba);
00728 
00729                                         if(a_dot_ba > 0)
00730                                         {
00731                                                 // Pick distance vertex a
00732                                                 dist = a->w.length();
00733                                         }
00734                                         else if(b_dot_ba < 0)
00735                                         {
00736                                                 // Pick distance vertex b
00737                                                 dist = b->w.length();
00738                                         }
00739                                         else
00740                                         {
00741                                                 // Pick distance to edge a->b
00742                                                 const btScalar a_dot_b = btDot(a->w, b->w);
00743                                                 dist = btSqrt(btMax((a->w.length2() * b->w.length2() - a_dot_b * a_dot_b) / ba_l2, (btScalar)0));
00744                                         }
00745 
00746                                         return true;
00747                                 }
00748 
00749                                 return false;
00750                         }
00751                         sFace*                          newface(sSV* a,sSV* b,sSV* c,bool forced)
00752                         {
00753                                 if(m_stock.root)
00754                                 {
00755                                         sFace*  face=m_stock.root;
00756                                         remove(m_stock,face);
00757                                         append(m_hull,face);
00758                                         face->pass      =       0;
00759                                         face->c[0]      =       a;
00760                                         face->c[1]      =       b;
00761                                         face->c[2]      =       c;
00762                                         face->n         =       btCross(b->w-a->w,c->w-a->w);
00763                                         const btScalar  l=face->n.length();
00764                                         const bool              v=l>EPA_ACCURACY;
00765 
00766                                         if(v)
00767                                         {
00768                                                 if(!(getedgedist(face, a, b, face->d) ||
00769                                                          getedgedist(face, b, c, face->d) ||
00770                                                          getedgedist(face, c, a, face->d)))
00771                                                 {
00772                                                         // Origin projects to the interior of the triangle
00773                                                         // Use distance to triangle plane
00774                                                         face->d = btDot(a->w, face->n) / l;
00775                                                 }
00776 
00777                                                 face->n /= l;
00778                                                 if(forced || (face->d >= -EPA_PLANE_EPS))
00779                                                 {
00780                                                         return face;
00781                                                 }
00782                                                 else
00783                                                         m_status=eStatus::NonConvex;
00784                                         }
00785                                         else
00786                                                 m_status=eStatus::Degenerated;
00787 
00788                                         remove(m_hull, face);
00789                                         append(m_stock, face);
00790                                         return 0;
00791 
00792                                 }
00793                                 m_status = m_stock.root ? eStatus::OutOfVertices : eStatus::OutOfFaces;
00794                                 return 0;
00795                         }
00796                         sFace*                          findbest()
00797                         {
00798                                 sFace*          minf=m_hull.root;
00799                                 btScalar        mind=minf->d*minf->d;
00800                                 for(sFace* f=minf->l[1];f;f=f->l[1])
00801                                 {
00802                                         const btScalar  sqd=f->d*f->d;
00803                                         if(sqd<mind)
00804                                         {
00805                                                 minf=f;
00806                                                 mind=sqd;
00807                                         }
00808                                 }
00809                                 return(minf);
00810                         }
00811                         bool                            expand(U pass,sSV* w,sFace* f,U e,sHorizon& horizon)
00812                         {
00813                                 static const U  i1m3[]={1,2,0};
00814                                 static const U  i2m3[]={2,0,1};
00815                                 if(f->pass!=pass)
00816                                 {
00817                                         const U e1=i1m3[e];
00818                                         if((btDot(f->n,w->w)-f->d)<-EPA_PLANE_EPS)
00819                                         {
00820                                                 sFace*  nf=newface(f->c[e1],f->c[e],w,false);
00821                                                 if(nf)
00822                                                 {
00823                                                         bind(nf,0,f,e);
00824                                                         if(horizon.cf) bind(horizon.cf,1,nf,2); else horizon.ff=nf;
00825                                                         horizon.cf=nf;
00826                                                         ++horizon.nf;
00827                                                         return(true);
00828                                                 }
00829                                         }
00830                                         else
00831                                         {
00832                                                 const U e2=i2m3[e];
00833                                                 f->pass         =       (U1)pass;
00834                                                 if(     expand(pass,w,f->f[e1],f->e[e1],horizon)&&
00835                                                         expand(pass,w,f->f[e2],f->e[e2],horizon))
00836                                                 {
00837                                                         remove(m_hull,f);
00838                                                         append(m_stock,f);
00839                                                         return(true);
00840                                                 }
00841                                         }
00842                                 }
00843                                 return(false);
00844                         }
00845 
00846         };
00847 
00848         //
00849         static void     Initialize(     const btConvexShape* shape0,const btTransform& wtrs0,
00850                 const btConvexShape* shape1,const btTransform& wtrs1,
00851                 btGjkEpaSolver2::sResults& results,
00852                 tShape& shape,
00853                 bool withmargins)
00854         {
00855                 /* Results              */ 
00856                 results.witnesses[0]    =
00857                         results.witnesses[1]    =       btVector3(0,0,0);
00858                 results.status                  =       btGjkEpaSolver2::sResults::Separated;
00859                 /* Shape                */ 
00860                 shape.m_shapes[0]               =       shape0;
00861                 shape.m_shapes[1]               =       shape1;
00862                 shape.m_toshape1                =       wtrs1.getBasis().transposeTimes(wtrs0.getBasis());
00863                 shape.m_toshape0                =       wtrs0.inverseTimes(wtrs1);
00864                 shape.EnableMargin(withmargins);
00865         }
00866 
00867 }

00871 //
00872 
00873 using namespace gjkepa2_impl;
00874 
00875 //
00876 int                     btGjkEpaSolver2::StackSizeRequirement()
00877 {
00878         return(sizeof(GJK)+sizeof(EPA));
00879 }
00880 
00881 //
00882 bool            btGjkEpaSolver2::Distance(      const btConvexShape*    shape0,
00883                                                                           const btTransform&            wtrs0,
00884                                                                           const btConvexShape*  shape1,
00885                                                                           const btTransform&            wtrs1,
00886                                                                           const btVector3&              guess,
00887                                                                           sResults&                             results)
00888 {
00889         tShape                  shape;
00890         Initialize(shape0,wtrs0,shape1,wtrs1,results,shape,false);
00891         GJK                             gjk;
00892         GJK::eStatus::_ gjk_status=gjk.Evaluate(shape,guess);
00893         if(gjk_status==GJK::eStatus::Valid)
00894         {
00895                 btVector3       w0=btVector3(0,0,0);
00896                 btVector3       w1=btVector3(0,0,0);
00897                 for(U i=0;i<gjk.m_simplex->rank;++i)
00898                 {
00899                         const btScalar  p=gjk.m_simplex->p[i];
00900                         w0+=shape.Support( gjk.m_simplex->c[i]->d,0)*p;
00901                         w1+=shape.Support(-gjk.m_simplex->c[i]->d,1)*p;
00902                 }
00903                 results.witnesses[0]    =       wtrs0*w0;
00904                 results.witnesses[1]    =       wtrs0*w1;
00905                 results.normal                  =       w0-w1;
00906                 results.distance                =       results.normal.length();
00907                 results.normal                  /=      results.distance>GJK_MIN_DISTANCE?results.distance:1;
00908                 return(true);
00909         }
00910         else
00911         {
00912                 results.status  =       gjk_status==GJK::eStatus::Inside?
00913                         sResults::Penetrating   :
00914                 sResults::GJK_Failed    ;
00915                 return(false);
00916         }
00917 }
00918 
00919 //
00920 bool    btGjkEpaSolver2::Penetration(   const btConvexShape*    shape0,
00921                                                                          const btTransform&             wtrs0,
00922                                                                          const btConvexShape*   shape1,
00923                                                                          const btTransform&             wtrs1,
00924                                                                          const btVector3&               guess,
00925                                                                          sResults&                              results,
00926                                                                          bool                                   usemargins)
00927 {
00928         tShape                  shape;
00929         Initialize(shape0,wtrs0,shape1,wtrs1,results,shape,usemargins);
00930         GJK                             gjk;    
00931         GJK::eStatus::_ gjk_status=gjk.Evaluate(shape,-guess);
00932         switch(gjk_status)
00933         {
00934         case    GJK::eStatus::Inside:
00935                 {
00936                         EPA                             epa;
00937                         EPA::eStatus::_ epa_status=epa.Evaluate(gjk,-guess);
00938                         if(epa_status!=EPA::eStatus::Failed)
00939                         {
00940                                 btVector3       w0=btVector3(0,0,0);
00941                                 for(U i=0;i<epa.m_result.rank;++i)
00942                                 {
00943                                         w0+=shape.Support(epa.m_result.c[i]->d,0)*epa.m_result.p[i];
00944                                 }
00945                                 results.status                  =       sResults::Penetrating;
00946                                 results.witnesses[0]    =       wtrs0*w0;
00947                                 results.witnesses[1]    =       wtrs0*(w0-epa.m_normal*epa.m_depth);
00948                                 results.normal                  =       -epa.m_normal;
00949                                 results.distance                =       -epa.m_depth;
00950                                 return(true);
00951                         } else results.status=sResults::EPA_Failed;
00952                 }
00953                 break;
00954         case    GJK::eStatus::Failed:
00955                 results.status=sResults::GJK_Failed;
00956                 break;
00957                 default:
00958                                         {
00959                                         }
00960         }
00961         return(false);
00962 }
00963 
00964 #ifndef __SPU__
00965 //
00966 btScalar        btGjkEpaSolver2::SignedDistance(const btVector3& position,
00967                                                                                         btScalar margin,
00968                                                                                         const btConvexShape* shape0,
00969                                                                                         const btTransform& wtrs0,
00970                                                                                         sResults& results)
00971 {
00972         tShape                  shape;
00973         btSphereShape   shape1(margin);
00974         btTransform             wtrs1(btQuaternion(0,0,0,1),position);
00975         Initialize(shape0,wtrs0,&shape1,wtrs1,results,shape,false);
00976         GJK                             gjk;    
00977         GJK::eStatus::_ gjk_status=gjk.Evaluate(shape,btVector3(1,1,1));
00978         if(gjk_status==GJK::eStatus::Valid)
00979         {
00980                 btVector3       w0=btVector3(0,0,0);
00981                 btVector3       w1=btVector3(0,0,0);
00982                 for(U i=0;i<gjk.m_simplex->rank;++i)
00983                 {
00984                         const btScalar  p=gjk.m_simplex->p[i];
00985                         w0+=shape.Support( gjk.m_simplex->c[i]->d,0)*p;
00986                         w1+=shape.Support(-gjk.m_simplex->c[i]->d,1)*p;
00987                 }
00988                 results.witnesses[0]    =       wtrs0*w0;
00989                 results.witnesses[1]    =       wtrs0*w1;
00990                 const btVector3 delta=  results.witnesses[1]-
00991                         results.witnesses[0];
00992                 const btScalar  margin= shape0->getMarginNonVirtual()+
00993                         shape1.getMarginNonVirtual();
00994                 const btScalar  length= delta.length(); 
00995                 results.normal                  =       delta/length;
00996                 results.witnesses[0]    +=      results.normal*margin;
00997                 return(length-margin);
00998         }
00999         else
01000         {
01001                 if(gjk_status==GJK::eStatus::Inside)
01002                 {
01003                         if(Penetration(shape0,wtrs0,&shape1,wtrs1,gjk.m_ray,results))
01004                         {
01005                                 const btVector3 delta=  results.witnesses[0]-
01006                                         results.witnesses[1];
01007                                 const btScalar  length= delta.length();
01008                                 if (length >= SIMD_EPSILON)
01009                                         results.normal  =       delta/length;                   
01010                                 return(-length);
01011                         }
01012                 }       
01013         }
01014         return(SIMD_INFINITY);
01015 }
01016 
01017 //
01018 bool    btGjkEpaSolver2::SignedDistance(const btConvexShape*    shape0,
01019                                                                                 const btTransform&              wtrs0,
01020                                                                                 const btConvexShape*    shape1,
01021                                                                                 const btTransform&              wtrs1,
01022                                                                                 const btVector3&                guess,
01023                                                                                 sResults&                               results)
01024 {
01025         if(!Distance(shape0,wtrs0,shape1,wtrs1,guess,results))
01026                 return(Penetration(shape0,wtrs0,shape1,wtrs1,guess,results,false));
01027         else
01028                 return(true);
01029 }
01030 #endif //__SPU__
